column1: Local Foods////I love you Yelpers whose ravings about Local Foods helped me talk a group of friends to meet there. Everyone loved the food and relaxed style service. The place has some charm and it spacious
column2: but it gets pretty crowded. I had the famous crispy chicken sandwich
column3: which is as tasty as everyone says with the tender and crunchy filling (no
column4: it's not fried chicken) to the delicious pretzel roll. For sides I tried the kale salad (also very good) and house made chips (super good). I also liked that you pay for a drink and then could try the various choices at a help yourself station.
